examples: そういう言い方は{誤解}{ごかい}{招}{まね}きます
Don't misunderstand me [what I say]. Don't take what I say the wrong way.｟話｠Don't get me wrong.
生きている{限り}{かぎり}ご{親切}{しんせつ}を忘れません
I will not forget your kindness, as long as I live.

けっきょく.english: As a result, after all, in the end
examples: 何度もやってみたが{結局}{けっきょく}だめだった。
I tried many times, but failed after all [but failed in the end, only to fail, ╳but failed at last]
